main event: Witness observed a bright, fuzzy object in the west around 9:00 p.m. on 28 May 1967 in Lynbrook, New York.
interesting points: The object was black and white with no sound, similar to a saucer shape,Several reliable local residents reported seeing similar objects over time,A previous sighting by the report author occurred on 3 May 1966 lasting 25-30 minutes,The object hovered silently and seemed to have a force field that repelled a nearby plane,The report suggests that the object cannot be explained by meteorites, comets, satellites, or experimental aircraft.
witness description: Member of the Lynbrook Academy flying club, 16 years old, Male
